page.title: 14FOXRUSH AND MANOR FARM
page.content: There are 2 farms to the southwest of our square set under I.C.I works, Foxrush and Manor farms.Foxrush is not a farm in its own right but part of a unit based at Stokesley,the land being rented from Langbaugh council.Foxrush has 110 acres:20 acres of winter wheat ,53 acres of winter barley,8 acres of sprig barley,15 acres of oilseed rape. Which is used as a rotator.7 of his acres are left fallow. Mr.Barker,who owns Manor farm,has 300 acres which is divided as follows:100 acres of oilseed rape,100 acres winter wheat,100 acres of winter barley. The farmers are more concerned about children from the local housing estate ruining the crops,than polution from I.C.I.
